website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and powerful, with 8.5-inch wheels powered by a 700-watt motor, you travel in style.
pros: Available in black, blue, and red, this is a great off-road hover board for all ages
It has 2 350 watt motors to take you across gravel, grass, dirt, and wet surfaces of all kinds
cons: Some have had issues with manufacturer's warranty

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first hover board wasn't sure how long it would take me to learn to ride it. After like 30 minutes of training on my own against a wall I was able to ride it with no problems. The only thing I find bad about this hover board is that every time it starts up it makes a really loud starting indicator noise and says Bluetooth on which I wish I could switch off. Also sometimes when I get off and if it hits something it keeps beeping and won't stop until I power off and back on again. Apart from these two things I think the hover board if pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Thomas

customer_reviews.title: BEST hoverboard!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 13 yr old daughter! We love the app you can download on your smartphone. The app has a self balancing mode, adult mode, you can set the speed limit, change LED lights, shut the hoverboard down and a few other functions. We think it is a lot better than the others because of the rubber tires. My daughter even brings it in (after cleaning the tires) and rides it around on our hardwood floors with no damage to them. The speakers on it are great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Hoverboard on the market
customer_reviews.text: This Hoverboard is absolutely the best on the market. Its fast and extremely sturdy. Made of quality materials. The Hoverboard is a bit pricey compared to the cheap plastic knockoffs, but you get what you pay for. Would purchase again and I definitely recommend this product. P..s. You can charge the battery from 0 to 100 real quick. Yeah under 3 hours and u get approx. 10 miles with a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use once you get the hang of it. Lights are awesome as is the sound system. Getting the app on an iPhone was a bit difficult. Self balancing feature nice. Functionality is bar none. Doesn't work too well on the grass, haven't tried on gravel. App works well, wish it could change to mph instead of kph.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: such a great hoverboard! very easy to ride even for a ...
customer_reviews.text: such a great hoverboard! very easy to ride even for a first-time rider and my kids just got on and within minutes they were zipping around the house. Great quality, cool lights give it that futuristic look and it seems to hold a charge for a long time. The tires are massive which gives the board a really good height, comfortable ride, and even riding outside on lawn is no problem. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Liron Segev

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because hubby was jealous of our boy’s hover board. The higher weight capacity and off road tires are a huge selling point. Easier to ride than the smaller kid size, more stable feeling. Had an issue with the charging port but Gyroor took care of it no problem!
customer_reviews.author: T. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Well made...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well made and durable. My 15 year old hasn't broken it yet and has tested it's ruggedness taking the product off-road on many occasions. Not all the Bluetooth features work, unable to control lighting as website previously stated.
customer_reviews.author: Weagle

customer_reviews.title: Built tough with a smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty built with a smooth ride. I bought for my my 10 year old and she loves it. The parents love it too. I love that it comes with it's own totes bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problems with Shaking and stopping
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these hover boards for Christmas during the Amazon customer appreciation event in July. In October the kids just couldn’t wait any longer so I gave them their boards early while the weather was still nice. They loved them! However within a few hours of using them, one of the boards was shaking and stopping. My grandson has fallen off twice and injured himself because of this defect. I would love to give this 5 stars because it is well made and the kids love them. But the shaking and stopping is not safe and negates any Positive benefits. We have tried to contact seller but not successful yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast! - update
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend this hoverboard. It is sleek fast and is literally a miniature off road tank. This thing goes through grass and dirt with ease. It goes really fast and the battery last a long time! It may be pricy but trust me, it’s worth every penny! Would definitely make this purchase again! Update - After a week, All I can say is wow! Battery holds up extremely well, the app is great, and this thing is very well built.
customer_reviews.author: BRiddle

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few days then it quit.
customer_reviews.text: My son got this and it worked great for about 2 days then it quit balancing and was useless. He tried emailing the company (not Amazon) and they could barely put an English sentence together. On that note Amazon is great as always and I was able to send it back to them because it was within 30 days of purchase. Might have been a fluke problem one but beware if u are buying a for Christmas or a birthday that's far off. Make sure u use it a good bit in the first 30 days so u can return it if it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: BigTravG

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: The product looks well designed. Unfortunately after a few minutes of usage, one of the wheels stoped moving and the hover board vibrates when on. I am returning it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jurca Candin

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my 8 year old daughter and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 year old daughter and she loves it. But so do I -- might have to get a second to ride together. Another couple reviews mentioned the hoverboard shaking -- and this happened for us as well, but only when my daughter was on it. Once we downloaded the app and put the hoverboard into "Child mode" - the shaking stopped entirely. I'm sure this has to do with how the board responds to a lighter rider, and child mode must compensate for the lighter weight somehow. All-in-all, for the price on prime day, this is a solid value.
customer_reviews.author: Danny P. Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: It goes very fast and manoeuvrs well. It has held up to a lot of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for our 9 year old grandson. We live in the country so there is a lot of gravel and un level ground. He is not having any trouble using the Hoverboard in these areas. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is short/customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I will say it is powerful and can take a beating and is a lot of fun but you'll be lucky to get 2 miles on a charge and if you are actually offroading you might get a mile. Everytime it rolls over you have to turn it off and back on which hinders blue tooth use. After using this for everyday, even at work, for 6 months the charging port would no longer charge. I contacted the company via email. They had me send it off. They reimbursed me for the shipping. Then shipped me a new one within a week. I couldn't believe it. Very happy with the customer service of this company.
customer_reviews.author: mary jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Just got it the this is built very well solid and works great so far it's a mini tank! Will follow up after have it for a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gyroor hoverboard vibrates violently then kicks hard dismounting.
customer_reviews.text: Gyroor did not meet our expectations for stability. Our 9 year-old daughter who weighs under 75 pounds found the Gyroor dangerous. It would vibrate when she tried to accelerate and when anyone any size using it would try to dismount, the Gyroor would kick violently in a circle hitting the operators ankle. These problems occurred in adult or child mode and in any speed setting. This is not our first hoverboard but it is our last Gyroor.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate balance
customer_reviews.text: It does well at handling rough terrain but the gyros or something is off or too sensitive. If I tilt one foot forward and one back to turn in place, it starts spinning slowly and then whips around so fast i all most fall off. There's many other instances where it will act with a delay and seems pretty inaccurate. I'm disappointed because it actually seems harder to control than the one I bought at Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: I love its nice and cool design and it's a really ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves The Gyroor Board!!! Bought this board for my son, got it in 3 days and he loves it so much! I love its nice and cool design and it's a really sturdy hoverboard. He rides it everyday. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bao Li

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a Dud
customer_reviews.text: The app does not connect. Gyroor responded that the problem had been fixed. It was not. When I purchased, the reviews were solid and the Play store app had good ratings. Now, the rating is terrible, and the reviews only show posts from the last week or so. Without the app, its functionality is severely hindered. Also, after ten minutes of riding, it now has a wiggle between the two halves. Will be sure to find time to ride longer distances to see if this problem worsens. Not happy about the carbon footprint of having to return.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! This is my very first hover board and ...
customer_reviews.text: i just received my Gyroor Warrior today. So far so good! This is my very first hover board and it does everything the description says. Also comes with a carrying bag which was one of my concerns! Looks great and feels awesome. Taking my time learning how to operate the vehicle, but its not very complicated. I would recommend this board to anyone in search for nice quality with a budget friendly retail price.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel H.

customer_reviews.title: Hoverboard broken... Gyroor insists on a 5-star review in exchange for customer support
customer_reviews.text: I've never written an Amazon review before, but I feel compelled to now after my terrible experience with this hoverboard and Gyroor. The short story is that after only a few months of normal use, the hoverboard started shaking violently every time my 8-year-old son would step on it. Since then, I've emailed Gyroor support asking for help multiple times. Each time they insist I give them a 5-star review before they will take care of the issue. This is straight up extortion and manipulation of Amazon's review system. It's no wonder this faulty product has so many 5-star reviews *and* so many 1-star reviews. Heed my warning. Avoid this hoverboard and this company at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride, hard to share :)
customer_reviews.text: Love how solid and sturdy this board is. I'm 210# and it takes me anywhere I want. I was worried as I'm 47 that I may not be able to get the hang of it but has a great gyro in it. It's truly been a blast learning and getting good at this. I ride around my office and my neighborhood all the time. It's a blast. I only get teased by they young kids for my choice of 80s rock I blast over the built-in speakers. If your looking for a great hoverboard, look no further. I give you my word, and I have no affiliation with the company, it's a good one. ( I sent 2 others back).
customer_reviews.author: JF. Richards

customer_reviews.title: DO  NOT  BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is for Christmas but I think my grandson will love it! Update: he opened it on Christmas Day but it does not work and I’ve not had any luck getting in touch with anyone. Pls help. Everything we’ve read says bad motherboard. Still have not heard anything from anyone regarding this. Finally have been in touch with hello@gyroor.com but they said it did not come from their store and that is sounds like the main board needs to be replaced. I am so very upset since this was for my 8 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Barnette

customer_reviews.title: Won't connect to the app anymore. Useless
customer_reviews.text: This was a great hoverboard. I purchased it for my son and he used it for about 2 months before it stopped connecting to the Bluetooth app. I tried connecting it through different devices, but when you scan through the app, it doesn't find the hoverboard. Without access to the settings through the app, the hoverboard is rendered useless. He can't adjust the speed and now the self balancing is turned off and we can't turn it back on without access to the settings through the app. But it was excellent for the whole 2 months that it lasted. I don't recommend this product. I'm guessing the Bluetooth chip burnt out. Highly upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Marte

customer_reviews.title: All terrain!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great off-road hoverboard. Got it for my 11 and 9 yo kids, and we started at home, then outside on asfalt, followed by an unpaved dirt road. Yesterday we took it for a real test in a park, where kids rode them on hiking trails. Look at my review pictures - the hoverboard conquered all terrain - sand, grass, bumpy dirt amd gravel road. Granted - young kids have no fear, they are also lightweight, and have an amazing balance. We also held their hands and helped them through the more challenging terrain, but hands down Gyroor is an amazing off-road hoverboard and we recommend it hands-down!!
customer_reviews.author: Nordic Cat

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The product only lasted 6 weeks and would not turn on any longer. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Flaten

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 40 days, they quickly replaced with a new one!
customer_reviews.text: This hoverboard was absolutely awesome! Worked great on and off-road with no issues...for 40 days. Now it won’t run at all. Won’t charge and only beeps. I thought it needed calibrating but that didn’t fix it. All online research points to motherboard. I’ve contacted Gyroor but I’m still waiting for a response. We’ve owned several upscale hoverboards, this has been our most disappointing. UPDATE: I contacted their Customer Service through FB. They were quick to respond and sent a replacement the next day! I was disappointed the hoverboard stopped working, but they took care of the issue quickly so I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: The Mooses

customer_reviews.title: Not all the features works like they advertise.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's birthday. She like the fact that it had bluetooth speakers. It came and the bluetooth speakers doesn't work. I reached out to the company to see if I was doing something wrong. They did nothing to help. It's not built as sturdy as I thought it would be. One of the lights on one side stopped working after a few weeks. I tried emailing the company again, and nothing. I'm so sorry I bought hoverboard from this company. Customer care is awful.
customer_reviews.author: tallman

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable, Fast, and Tough
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ever hoverboard, and although it might look like you need a ton of skill to ride it, after only minutes of riding, you get used to it quick. This is durable; after dozens of times of rolling it over and crashing, it still runs like new! I was amazed how it could ride easily on any surface (grass, gravel, pavement, wood, etc.). The Speaker quality is way better than I thought; its very loud and clear. This hoverboard is very fast, durable, and has a ton of features!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: After having 2 weeks this thing has major problems. Would throw our 9 year old off. The app is terrible and there is no customer support! We returned! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Karri Hoener

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he LOVES it. We live in the country and don’t have a good space to ride in concrete so we were looking for something that would work in grass and on sand. The charging port broke in the first month and the company replaced the hover board. They covered the cost for me to return it and sent us a new one. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Georgetta S.Bachman

customer_reviews.title: The Stereo system SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: The stereo sounds as if is busted and by the time we gave it to our Grand Daughter for her birthday it was past time to be able to return it. And when you're buying for a 12 year old that is all about her music it is just sad that we can not fix this problem for her.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Wells

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic hover board! My son received it for Christmas. It is a great quality and seems very durable. Its very stable if you know how to ride a hover board (I don’t...). My son jumped right on and went along. The battery seems good. He hasn’t complained about it dying too fast. Update: one side stopped working after he went over a bump. So much for off-road. We’ve been trying to get it fixed but the warranty we bought won’t contact us back. Should have just spent the extra money and gotten the Swagtron.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: We ordered for our sons birthday who was turning 10. It’s the Best gift he said. The Hoverboard is Amazing. Smooth ride and the sound is perfect. Really enjoying the ride on it. You can change lights which is pretty cool, it’s self Balancing, fast ride. You can download the app and controls the speed that you can allow for kids. It’s a Awesome product and awesome customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness! That is all!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this Gyroor warrior G2! Thing looks like a mini tank! Handles like one too! Sturdy, smooth, battery life is fantastic and has Bluetooth so you can jam out if you want to. It is a bit awkward until you get the hang of it but once you do, it’s just wonderful! I couldn’t ask for a better hoverboard! Can change the light color in it as well! Has kid mode, you can control the speed, what’s not to love about this! Definitely will purchase more Gyroor products in the future! Will definitely suggest this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: mixed reviews  good points and not so great
customer_reviews.text: It is much bulkier, way bigger than standard hoverboards, than I imagined which works great for my son. He loves it and it does great on our property, we live in a very rural area and very little concrete. Does well in our yard and gravel driveway. The biggest drawback and why I'm only giving 3 stars... I wish the battery life was longer so he could enjoy it more. I feel like it is on the charge more than it is being used. I figured it runs down quickly down because the surface makes the board work harder than simple smooth concrete...defeats the purpose for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hoverboard for our 12 year old who had limited experience and he was able to ride it immediately and loves playing on it. He shoots basketball hoops while on it with no issues at all. It goes through the grass and up street curbs (gently) without any problems. It has a smooth ride and charges completely in about an hour. He also likes to play music on the speakers. They're quite loud, much to his delight! We strongly considered buying one that was much more expensive and are glad we didn't because he loves this one. He weighs around 75 pounds so doesn't put much stress on it.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: At first we were very happy with this hoverboard. However, it stopped working in less than a month. When my son tries to turn it on it just shakes and one side won't engage. On the rare occasion it will start up one side will just stop as he's going. We bought the additional warranty but it is still under the manufacturer warranty and have been getting the run around. They've sent us the same email directing us to reset the hoverboard and required two separate videos be sent of my son rising the broke and dangerous hoverboard. Very disappointed. Would not recommend Gyroor.
customer_reviews.author: sandles

customer_reviews.title: Update....Gyroor customer support replaced the broken Hoverboard with New One!
customer_reviews.text: Update Aug 16, 2019:Gyroor customer support reached out and gave me contact info. They sent a shipping label and once we sent the faulty unit back they sent us a new Hoverboard and it is working great. I thank Gyroor for making things right and have changed my review to 5 stars as it really is a great Hoverboard!!! My son loved this as his favorite gift from Santa. After 3 months, once we unplug the thing all it does is beep at us. Am discouraged by the other reviews regarding customer support but will update if we have any luck fixing the issue....stinks having a $300 50+lb paperweight sitting in the garage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A White

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hoverboard... it’s so hard to ride over off terrain though. Although my gf got the number one hoverboard in America The Rover a 1000 dollar product and it was just as hard to learn and go over rocks and grass and what not.. all in all everyone that has rode our hoverboards prefers my GYROOR over her rover x... my 299$ gyroor versus her 1000$ rover x that came cracked in the box and they refuse to fix! Don’t buy a rover. Buy a gyroor!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: Only had a couple weeks but so far so good. My 8 yr old son loves it. We like the off road capabilities because we live on gravel roads and drive ways and it has no problem going over gravel and unpaved roads. This is a reputable and well made hoverboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for about 9 months, now problems.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at handling our terrain: gravel, grassy hills, dry, damp or snowy ground...for about 9 months. Now it has become significantly underpowered even when fully charged. It also has had intermittent problems of stopping and throwing the rider off. Now, in order to send it in for warranty repairs they are demanding a 5 star review in order to authorize a return label.
customer_reviews.author: minnesota mom

customer_reviews.title: Nor here nor there but everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 other hoverboards before landing on this one. You pay for quality people. After extensive review reading on and off Amazon. This one was came highly recommended, it is on the larger side of with oversized wheels comparison to others, which is handy if you plan on taking it outside to ride. It is really easy to ride for beginners more so than the other 2 we got first. The app it has is kinda garbage if that was better I would give it a full 5 star, I would do 4.5 as the product itself is awesome and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Robles

customer_reviews.title: Well, I guess the only way to say it is, read the review
customer_reviews.text: Well, my brother who is not bad at balancing broke his arm the first time he tried it it Also, in the video it looks so cool and it looks like you would use it all the time Well, in reality it sat in my garage and I used it about 5 times before I sold it I would not recommend this, unless you have unoccupied large paved trails that are close to your house I would reccomend a electric scooter the one I got was a “gotrax rival” also known as “gotrax gxl v2”
customer_reviews.author: hellohello

customer_reviews.title: A+++ Gyrooboard Customer Care
customer_reviews.text: After several month of riding this board I had an issue of the board not balance correctly (I may have taken it off a curb) in desperation I sent Gyrooboard an email late on a Sunday afternoon, within a few hours I received a reply on how to repair/recalibrate the balancing of the board. Problem solved A+++ for customer care. I wouldn't hesitate to buy from this manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Sportybg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product support!
customer_reviews.text: This is the hoverboard for you! Here’s why: I purchased 2 of these a year ago and my teens love them (and I’ve had some fun with them as well!). Battery life is excellent and they charge quickly. They can be set to normal or turbo mode as your skill and proficiency improve. The smartphone app is pretty cool and allows music streaming. ..and last but not least, the customer support. I recently had a couple questions that were addressed PERSONALLY via a very friendly email exchange. It’s SO refreshing to receive excellent customer service these days!
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: This is one badass hover board
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this hover board. She has great balance but I can’t believe how easy she rides it. She goes up hills down hills in the grass on gravel even in mud. It’s fast but easy to control. It’s heavy but that’s because it’s metal and built very solid. Long battery life quick to charge. Plays music with a great speaker right off Bluetooth. The app for it is super easy to use and automatically connects. The wheels and rims on this are like a tank. I can’t say enough about it. I’m 220 lbs and I can ride this and I honestly believe someone 300 lbs could to its that tough.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Burge

customer_reviews.title: not worth, waste of moneyt
customer_reviews.text: The Battery pin broke within an year. When we reached out to customer service via the email provided from gyroor website. they asked us to ping them via Facebook and upload the picture. when we did it, they started saying write us a 5 star review then we will send you the Charging pin for free. the link provided was amazon.com/ryp. Finally they did not help us, we lost $299
customer_reviews.author: Surendra Vakkala

customer_reviews.title: Not a good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this hover board for the price you pay it’s a junk. They battery you charge and ride less then 5 mins and it’s dead. Not at all worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great off-road Hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: This is our first Hoverboard investment and we did a ton of research...Gyroor seemed to be the top-of-the-line (for what we could spend) and it has proven to be worth every penny. We ended up buying 3 and have even calibrated one of the boards and it is working great. The kids (and adults) played on them for hours yesterday and the charge lasted for quite some time. When charging was needed, it did not take very long to fully charge. Looking forward to many more days and nights...the lights are so cool to watch at night..of riding these Hoverboards!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It just makes me think the quality control with this company is very poor. The instructions were very minimal
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these scooters for each of my sons. One worked and the other started acting strange after about 30 minutes of use. Then it would randomly turn off while riding and throw you off the board. This is on a full charge too. Extremely dangerous and sending back for a replacement. The other board seemed to have problems steering as you had to push down on the left side to make it go straight. It just makes me think the quality control with this company is very poor. The instructions were very minimal. The app would not work. Overall, I could not recommend purchasing these boards.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Two is better than one
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year-old daughter loves it, got it for her birthday. Only problem, her 6-year-old little brother loves it, too. We will soon have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well built, no issues.  Took back a Swagtron T1 and glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I took back a Swagtron T1 after issues with actually two defective units and got the Gyroor. Glad I did. It's been used extensively since Christmas. 4 months now. Granted it's my 70 pound daughter riding it so I guess I can't say it's a 200 pound guy here but she goes all over with it and loves it. No issues at all. It just goes and goes. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C

customer_reviews.title: Great board not so great app and manual.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great hover but manual is written in broken English. Somewhat hard to decipher in parts but all in all a solid product minus the app that the developers probably spent 5 minutes on. It’s clunky. 2 days in and charger quit working!
customer_reviews.author: Drone Dude

customer_reviews.title: Customer service, started good and now silence.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product has been good, however it stopped holding a charge about 6 months after purchasing it. Initially the GYROOR Customer Service was responsive and worked with me to have it returned for repair. As of today, it has been approximately 4 weeks and they have been non-responsive to my emails. I don’t know when or even if I will get the board back for my daughter. I understand warrantee repairs take time, but absolutely no response or feedback is frustrating and unacceptable. I have changed what was a 5 star review to a 1 star review. If I ever get my hoverboard back, I am certainly happy to change this review back to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't calibrate, junk app, zero company/tech support...waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a family gift after reading reviews and web research. Board won't calibrate. Board won't pair with app. When turned on, board rotates to a position imposivle to stand on. While the directions are written in English (barely) they are mostly useless. Company support is useless and unresponsive. In short, a $300, 30lb paperweight that I will be sendong back once my children are done being sad. Find a company with better support and with instrucrions that are better.
customer_reviews.author: Austin B

customer_reviews.title: An amazing piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons 11th birthday and was impressed with how heavy and sturdy it was. He was riding it within 5 minutes although I set it on balance and beginner mode. It made a great difference. I am not techy at all and can never understand instruction manuals but was able to figure it out fairly quickly. I would have appreciated better instructions and easier links to their website. It seemed a bit pricey but wanted him to get the most of it and grow into it - bought the all terrain. So far we are all glad we picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine C.

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: My child he wants a lot a hoverboard for his birthday... so we decided to buy him one... ordered 2 of them different prices different brands... When I open the Gyroor I notice right away to quality, Very well build quality Materials and Sturdy. Return the another one and left the Gyroor. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sergiu

customer_reviews.title: Super Hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for my nephew 8 year birthday he loves it ! Super Hoverboard that works on concrete, pavement, grass, anywhere ! Charges and holds a charge well after 10 months so far. Good quality unit. Buy it ! The charger brick gets very hot on summer days, I only trust charging it in my garage ground. I store it in the house during the cold winters in NJ. I think the charger needs to get improved, besides that its great.
customer_reviews.author: MarkD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for my husband and he loves it. Speakers are Excellent and paring to the phone for music is incredibly easy. It self balances and is very smooth. It’s very well made and they have direct customer support should you need anything or have questions.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this. I bought a black one first for my 9 year old son. My daughter liked it so much that I had to buy her the red one. We love that it lights up at night and the Bluetooth music is great quality! The red one has a problem connecting to the music but gyroor is letting me send it into them to fix and then they’ll send it back!!!! I also love the fact there is an app on your phone where you can control and see how fast your going, the battery life etc... great product highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: So we had this product for 1 year,, seemed ok,, then parts came loose. I put it away and the following summer it wouldn’t hold a charge or work in any fashion,, I’m very disappointed with this product .. poorly built and won’t last
customer_reviews.author: Deakey

customer_reviews.title: Best hoverboard on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hoverboard for my ten-year-old son who is very tall and weighs over a hundred pounds. It's worked out great he loves it! We are really happy that we bought a Gyroor. This is a very solid sturdy very well put together hoverboard and it runs great as well
customer_reviews.author: SeanMVIA

customer_reviews.title: It’s the Best and Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: It’s tough, powerful, and the battery life is great! The whole family enjoys riding GYROOR! My 5 year old has learned some tricks and dances while on the Hoover board. App control is great! Bluetooth seems to drain battery quicker nonetheless it’s cool to have lights and Bluetooth while riding.
customer_reviews.author: EBs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my step daughter for her 9th birthday, she was able to get it set up on her own and was maneuvering around on it in minutes. The more she used it the more she was able to play with the settings to go faster and move out of the kid setting. I read about a lot of different hover boards before going with this and with the only downside being it weighing 30 lbs, which isn't an issue because shes not really carrying it around anywhere, this was the best one for her age. It's great that it's an offroad (rides in grass, on tar, light sand, etc) and is adaptable for each person.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best features available combined into one product
customer_reviews.text: What a top-notch hoverboard! After reading many reviews and tech articles on different features and companies, this model has about anything you could want. We bought it for our daughter for her 9th birthday. She was riding it 15 minutes after it was charged. The "child rider" setting on the app, and speed control are a must-have for beginners. She loves the big wheels, the customizable led lights and the bluetooth speaker. So far so good. Definitely one of the best I have seen as far as battery power, safety, degree of incline capability and weight capacity. Shipped on time, packed well. Very happy. Thanks for the great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great company!
customer_reviews.text: Gyroor responded to my email the same day even with a significant time difference. They could not have been more willing to help. We were grateful for their options to help when our machine was broken in a fall. I highly recommend both this hoverboard and the company as they clearly care about customer service and those they are serving.
customer_reviews.author: RSK

customer_reviews.title: Nice product tho 👍
customer_reviews.text: This was a great hoverboard. Unfortunately I had return it. The charger stopped working ☹️. They did refund my money. I wish I could have been sent a new charger. But the board was nice. Very fast
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and purchased 2 Gyroor hoverboards for my 8 & 10 year old kids. They learned to ride them in a day. We had a problem with on of the boards and contacted Gyroor directly. They emailed me back right away. Tried to trouble shoot the problem with me. Unfortunately, that didn't work. They sent me a new board immediately!! They emailed me a return label. I shipped damaged board back. What great customer service!! I wish all my purchases came with such helpful crew. I will definitely recommend Gyroor. Thank you Gyroor!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: After buying a $200 hoverboard for my kids that stopped charging after only a few days, I begrudgingly spent a little more for this Gyroor and the quality difference was immediately evident. It balances better, battery lasts longer, and after a little practice the kids could ride it across grass and gravel. Don't get fooled by the fake reviews on other hoverboards, get one of these and you won't have to worry about it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P Witmer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my10-year old nephew. He loves it! He lives in a mountanous area and the sidewalks and roads are treacherous. This hoverboard has no trouble navigating any of the steep inclines or broken pavement, and he quickly learned how to use it. He also zooms around on gravel, grass and dirt paths. A few weeks after he got it, he had some problems with the self-balancing function, and the company graciously sent a new board. I would definitely purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: "gweneagle"

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday. It is nice looking and works perfectly but most importantly it is durable and I believe will stand the test of time. They ride it in the house as well and we have taken it camping. Works wonderfully, no issues that I have noticed. Plus the music makes it even more fun. One small complaint is that the zipper on the carrying case that it came with broke like the second time zipping it up. Not really a huge deal since it has two zippers and we are able to zip it most of the way closed. Overall I'm glad we bought this particular hoverboard.
customer_reviews.author: Josei L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Hover
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product! I bought this for my son’s 12th bday and it is pretty incredible. Very very quiet, you cannot hear a thing from it no matter how fast. It goes over changed pavement w/ease. It looks rigged and the large, fatter tires make for sturdiness! My son is super happy. We may buy more for the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: ARA

customer_reviews.title: Speakers do not and short battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth speakers do not works. Short battery life, only last for 30 minutes with full charge.
customer_reviews.author: TVB

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got this hoverboard as a replacement to one he got for Christmas. The first one broke within two days. He has had this one for about a month now, and it is still going strong. He loves it! We haven't had the chance to try out outside yet, because of snow and cold weather, but he's looking forward to this in the spring!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son 6 months ago, and he was scared to try it. I finally got him on it today, and he rode it two feet and a wheel broke off! It can’t be fixed! The product is obviously defective. Let’s just hope the company stands behind their product! Update: I can attest that this company has superb customer service and stands behind their products. They were great to work with to quickly resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Major software flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is my second board in a row as soon as you download their software and try to play with the colors or the speed of the board it becomes unruly and unrideable you cannot reset it
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Weisbecker

customer_reviews.title: Zippy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my son fell off the first week and it zipped into a puddle of water, major money wasted down the drain. I wish I didn’t spend this amount of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Paper Weight
customer_reviews.text: The board was lots of fun to use when it worked. It is 9 months old, and has been used maybe a dozen times. I just went to use it and the plug broke of at the connection port plug-in. It cannot be recharged. Furthermore, it doesn't look like they sell replacement chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Sisson

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had this hoverboard for 2 weeks before we had problems with it, the blue light on top keeps blinking and beeping. Can’t find anything on google to address the problem and no trouble shooting in the instructions. The have no customer service number that I can find your only options are to contact via email or Facebook. I’ve been emailing back and forth for a week and still have no solution
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light defect
customer_reviews.text: Only oneside has the blue LED light. The other side doesn't light. Is this a defect?
customer_reviews.author: Yuan Liu0824

customer_reviews.title: He LOVES, LOVES, LOVES it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WHERE do I begin?? I researched hoverboards to death. Yes, there are cheaper devices. But if you’re looking for a solid, stable, ridiculously fun and easy-to-learn hoverboard that goes anywhere and everywhere — with a SUPER LONG LASTING BATTERY that recharges fast — this is THE ONE to buy! Do it. You won’t regret it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Me me me me!

customer_reviews.title: Great board horrible charger
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this board. We live in Hawaii and it wouldn’t ship here. So we had to ship to a friend then pay another $150 to ship here and it took 3 months to arrive, totaling missing his birthday. After using it for 3 weeks the charging cord broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product because we thought it might work well off road as we live in the country. It doesn't roll as well in the grass or gravel as we thought it would, but that being said, it may have something to do with the size of those riding. My husband and adult kids can ride it fine with no problems. The higher weight limit was also a reason we chose this hoverboard and it's handling that great! The boards were easy for everyone, including my younger kids, to learn to ride and maneuver them. They love riding them around inside or at a park. We've had a lot of fun with these!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: App doesn't save settings
customer_reviews.text: The speed limit is reset to default every time you power the board off and on. And every time you fall off slightly and it rolls a bit, it will keep beeping until its turned off and on. Child mode is saved but the speed limit is pointless if you can't save it.
customer_reviews.author: Blaskotron

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this! Buyer beware. We bought this for our kidS for Christmas it was great for about an hour then the battery died put it on the charger overnight. The next morning my kids were excited to get on it again and it instantly beeps low battery! We wrote gyroor and they wanted a video of the product then asked us to ship it to them. We haven’t received the fixed product yet and it’s been a month!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Solid product!! I would recommend 👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Charge time is accurate. Device rides pretty smooth and is powerful. App is responsive instantly with the device. Pretty easy to get the hang of it. Device is very responsive. Has two modes. Child mode and adult mode. Use child mode if you never rode one of these things before.
customer_reviews.author: Philly 215

customer_reviews.title: Read ALL the directions and instructions before riding.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my grandson. We have only had it for two weeks but he absolutely loves it. He read the directions, downloaded the APP, and has kept it clean protecting the battery compartment. Never saw him so excited and happy about a sport type item. He loves his X-Box but it has taken second stage to the hoverboard. I hope it continues to give the fun it says without difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: mayapple

customer_reviews.title: They shouldn't call this sport Warrior they should call it cheerleader.
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst of award experience in my life. When you download the app and you want to self balance it it shuts itself off and everything. Warrior please maybe a Pom-Pom Warrior.
customer_reviews.author: Lee John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive the newer color Illustrated packaging. Seemed as if someone used it before arriving. The package had no tape from keeping anyone from opening the box. Should be cheaper if there’s any chance of it being used and during this COVID-19 pandemic I would assume packages should be properly sealed. Overall great product I’ve been recommending your GYROOR Hoverboard to all my siblings and friends because it’s just Awesome aside from the packaging it really is the best Hoverboard; The only hoverboard worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It was an X-mas gift for my ten year old son. He loves it and rides it pretty much every day. The setup with the app on your smartphone was very easy. The lights and Bluetooth speakers work very well. It's quite fast and the battery lasts a long time. So far we're very satisfied with this hoverboard!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It broke and will not recharge in less than 60 days
customer_reviews.text: Customer support provided by China and they asked me to post this video onto Facebook so they could research the issue. I do not use Facebook so I am posting it here. Highly disappointed that this nearly $300 product failed after less than 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: One year later.... Still a favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Updating this review one year later... Still AMAZING and I love how it can still move pretty fast on grass. My son can also get up on small curbs with this bad boy! I have many....many regretful purchases for Christmas but this was NOT one of them. Best decision after doing some research and reading reviews. I spent WEEKS researching and reading SO many reviews before settling on this one. Just get it. I love that the tires are not plastic!! This thing is so cool. Pretty sure I'll be using it while my son is in school.
customer_reviews.author: rose croskey

customer_reviews.title: Living the Dream! Thanks Gyroor!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this hoverboard to my grandkids in N Carolina for Christmas. They opened it early and quickly learned how to ride it. They are ages 9 and 11. They both LOVE it! No problems with setup through Bluetooth. The neighborhood kids are in awe. Great product, well made, worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, working as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Had it a few weeks and the kids are enjoying it. It works on the dirt and grass all around my house, even the hill. It's really heavy so plan to charge it where you use it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: E. H. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my niece. She absolutely loves it. The app allows you to put it in kids mode. It has a stabilizing option which is great and you can govern the speed. I opted for this off road version thinking she could practice it on grass so she doesn’t hurt herself while learning on concrete. She is 9 and immediately picked up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Incredible machine especially for the price. I did a lot of research and am very satisfied. For 11 yr old girl, she’s also very happy, riding, spinning, it’s fast, durable, self balancing, great battery life. It is heavy to carry for smaller children.
customer_reviews.author: PestOH

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I have yet to get a refund for the purchase of three of these items purchased. This product did not last two months all three of this product cracked . Why would you put this on the market to sell knowing this Hoover board is defective. I spent 300.00 for three of them. I can’t get my money back. I bought this gift for 3 kids under the age of 14. There’s no way they met the max weight limit. Al three kids put together weight 220lbs. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Christy

product_meta.title: Gyroor Hoverboard Warrior 8.5 inch All Terrain Off Road Hoverboard with Music Speakers and LED Lights,UL2272 Certified Self Balancing Hoverboards
feature_bullets: SUPER STURDY & DURABLE – The Warrior 8.5 inch Off Road Hoverboard is made from a perfect combination of UL approved materials which make up its sturdy structure that guarantees durability while keeping you safe during rides and allowing you enjoy this hoverboard for years to come.

ALL-TERRAIN RIDES - With 8.5 inch solid tires and 700 watts motor you can be sure of a smooth and easier ride on all terrains. So, feel free to ride on grass, dirt, gravel or wet surfaces. Ride like a warrior!
MUSIC SPEAKER INCLUDED – For the music lovers, we have added a Built-in branded high quality music speaker to allow you play your music when riding the hoverboard. No ride will be more fun than this!
SELF BALANCING BOARD – The Self balancing technology used for this hoverboard makes it easier and safe for new riders. Master the art of balancing in minutes!

OUR SAFETY PROMISE – This hoverboard is UL2272 certified and this means it has passed strict electrical and safety test to assure safe charging and rides. If you feel this hoverboard is performing below this promise, feel free to contact us.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
